query:
SELECT fl.levelName, COUNT(*) as site_count, GROUP_CONCAT(s.siteNumber ORDER BY s.siteNumber SEPARATOR ', ') as sites
FROM sites s 
LEFT JOIN floor_levels fl ON s.floorLevelId = fl.id 
WHERE s.centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name = 'Campbelltown Mall')
GROUP BY fl.levelName
ORDER BY fl.levelName;

WHERE s.centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name = 'Campbelltown Mall')
GROUP BY fl.levelName
ORDER BY fl.levelName;
